title: pixel 2 screen is broke become black & flashing green
content:
I drop my phone today from the dining table and the screen become....the beautiful broke glass lol....
And it was totally black out after few minutes it became like a bit green in the middle.
After that now is showing this ugly green.......
I don't know how to contact with anyone from customer service since the Google support page doesn't have any Live chat anymore.(I'm not in the US currently)
I don't know if this situation still under warranty to fix or it cannot fix at all....
I might to have change all the screen....
